projects.title: TravelLogistic Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive full-stack platform for managing transportation logistics with real-time tracking and multi-role interfaces for clients, drivers, managers, and administrators.
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack MERN platform for real-time trip management and GPS tracking.
projects.problem: Transportation companies needed a unified platform to manage multiple stakeholders (clients, drivers, managers, administrators) with real-time trip tracking and secure communication capabilities.
projects.solution: Developed a full-stack TravelLogistic platform using the MERN stack with role-based access control, real-time GPS tracking, instant messaging system, and comprehensive trip management features. The platform provides different interfaces tailored to each user role while maintaining data security and real-time synchronization.

projects.title: Youdemy - E-Learning Platform
projects.description: A full-stack course management platform designed for students, teachers, and administrators with role-based functionalities and seamless user experience.
projects.shortDescription: E-learning platform with role-based access for students, teachers, and admins.
projects.problem: Educational institutions needed a comprehensive platform to manage courses, students, and teachers with different access levels and functionalities for each role.
projects.solution: Built a full-stack e-learning platform with PHP/MySQL backend handling authentication and course management. Created a responsive frontend using JavaScript and Tailwind CSS ensuring smooth user experience across all devices. Implemented role-based access control for students, teachers, and administrators with tailored dashboards and features for each user type.

projects.title: Insurance Management Console
projects.description: A Java 8 console application for digitizing insurance operations with layered architecture and efficient data processing.
projects.shortDescription: Java console application for streamlining insurance operations.
projects.tech: Java 8, JDBC, Streams API, Lambda Expressions
projects.problem: Insurance companies needed to digitize their operations and move away from manual paper-based processes. The solution required efficient data processing and a maintainable codebase.
projects.solution: Developed a Java 8 console application with a clean layered architecture (Service/DAO pattern) using JDBC for database operations. Leveraged Java 8 Streams and Lambda expressions for efficient data processing and business logic implementation. The application provides a maintainable and scalable foundation for insurance operations management.
